text: HRrfl& rcfy <TTHT wifarcz0 7014 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (737 WRaett 37 rrorttif TNTT4) Y4FT / 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 %a 6, 4T2{-10, BTITT;, 7 Rrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/1/2000-Admn 3th December'11 QFFICE ORDER In Continuation of this office order No.11041/01/2005/Admn-| dt.20/07/2005 and subsequent office order No.11041/01/2005/Admn-| dt.30/1272005 and 11041/01/2010-Admn-Il dt.19/04/2010, it has been decided with approval of Competent Authority to extend the following to group 'D" staff engaged through placement agencies. 2 The consolidated wages of Peon and Chowkidar shall be as per monthly rale of unskilled labour prescribed in the minimum wages  circular of Delhi Government or the respective State in which the PIU is located whichever is higher Where monthly rate are not mentioned is the circular; the monthly rate will be worked out as 26 times the daily rate of unskilled labour The of Safaiwalla (Part time) shall be fixed at 45% of above rate: wages 3_ To the wages such worked out will be added components of PF, ESI & Bonus as per relevant labour laws and reliving charges equivalent to 1/6" of wages. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. ~UdL (Santleep P.
